Bitstamp Earn Lending: August 2024 Performance Report
Get a clear breakdown of how our lending product performed, along with borrower insights and market trends in August 2024.

The August Lending Performance Report is out, and it gives you a clear look at how our lending product performed last month. We've made this report to help you stay on top of the trends and key stats shaping crypto lending right now.

We’ve worked with Tesseract to pull together the insights you need. Whether you're actively lending or just keeping an eye on things, this report will give you the info you need to stay informed.

Highlights from the August report

  • Market overview: A quick look at what influenced crypto prices and market movements in August.
  • Portfolio insights: A breakdown of how our lending portfolio performed, including loan activity, asset distribution, and overall growth.
  • Risk management: How we’re keeping assets secure through smart collateral strategies.
  • Borrower metrics: An analysis of borrower leverage, giving you a clear picture of their financial health and what it means for future lending.

Our commitment to transparency is at the core of everything we do. We ensure that every report gives you a clear look at our product’s performance and the risks involved.
